title: The game is beyond broken for me
body:
Since the patch the game is broken:

*The sign in button may be grayed out... requiring the fix of editing a file inside LoL and restarting the launcher.

== If this has happened to you, go to your League of Legends folder, then to Config folder... then open a file called:
LeagueClientSettings.yaml with notepad. Find the line 'gameflow-patcher-lock: xxxxxxxx' and delete it. Close launcher and reopen. 

*It takes over a minute to Authenticate during login, in the normally busy hours. The authentication may fail and may loop fail (not even try) requiring restart of launcher. The next LONG attempt may get you in, but could fail again too. "Unexpected Error"

*Once in game, it may sometimes be extremely laggy yet ping may or may not be fine which seems like a packetloss issue. I myself have a steady 54ms for years, but since this patch the minions freeze, other champions are porting around, I cannot move my character, jungle minions won't spawn,the usual stuff you see with high latency, except the latency is very low!.. This may go on the entire game or randomly let up. Meanwhile my internet is perfectly fine and I can play any other game with 0% packetloss.  Restarting the client and relogging in fixes this sometimes... I might play another game after and 100% perfect. 

What's weird is not all of us are affected. If I had to guess some of us are being routed to the Riot Servers through a poor route? Some ports are bad somewhere? I can restart the client and fix the issues (sometimes).

== If you're like me you've restarted the client a number of times to try and get pass a block. Sometimes part of the launcher stays open even though you close it. There are 3 processes for the launcher. LeagueClient.exe, LeagueClientUx.exe, LeagueClientUxRender.exe. Press CTRL ALT DEL if you're on windows and go to task manager, hit Details tab and close all 3, then try and reopen client.

replies.body:
Just like my problem :))
There were people said that either my internet or my computer problem ( its a new fucking alien ware and my ping is always at 49-52 )  
{{summoner:3}} R.I.P
same issue here, this patch really messed it up tbh
Same issue here. Game is so unplayable and is completely bugged.

Yeah same here, I tested my connection speed, it's at its normal. Mid game earlier it just added 100+ MS which then started a chain reaction of severe lag. Even logging into the client it takes longer than usual as-well as the one hour straight issue of being told I lost connection to the league servers. Hope you guys see this and fix it as soon as possible, because it's hard to play the game with this issue.{{item:1042}}

As you can see 500+ pings with 0% packet loss.. (I replaced initial IPs for security reasons) The hop that is trouble is a 104.160.159.28... but that's not on my end at all.. That's a 104. network with a steady 6-7%.

Right now in game is 100% fine so I'm gonna keep it running... Testing launcher and it took about 15 seconds to login just now after I exited launcher which is much better.. but this morning at 6:30am it was good as well like that then went to being very bad again.

So maybe it's all fixed? IDK that's exactly whats been going on.. it can be fine for a while but then suddenly its a nightmare all over. That's how it's been since patch hit.

I think the issue is fluctuating. I'm in game right now, a custom game at that and everything is half a second to a second behind in attacking. I am attacking all in sight and where they die it takes almost a full second to then show I got the gold for it, so something is definitely wrong somewhere. It's still very bad for me where as somehow now, it's good for you at the moment, seems.. odd.

> [{quoted}](name=FieryAuraa,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dWsiAsHL,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-06-17T21:55:54.195+0000)
>
> I think the issue is fluctuating. I'm in game right now, a custom game at that and everything is half a second to a second behind in attacking. I am attacking all in sight and where they die it takes almost a full second to then show I got the gold for it, so something is definitely wrong somewhere. It's still very bad for me where as somehow now, it's good for you at the moment, seems.. odd.

Yeah at the moment... lol I don't feel safe at all. It does this.. Not even an hour ago before I did the test, I was on a roll with tryndamere.... I was one hit from killing a darius and he got away because the lag thing happened. It kept happening for a minute or 2 then it went back to good! I've been playing league for years and this is the first time I feel like any game now I might get a leave for this lag problem and inability to log right back into a game if I get dc. In all these years I think I have 1 leave on my record, maybe 2 at the most and it was from power outage or internet outage, extremely rare considering I've played thousands of games.

Come to think of it.. since the patch this is the best it's been.. and I've done absolutely nothing on my end.

Yeah it seems strange. The first match I had earlier, I was at 115MS which being a player on NA from another region, is normal. But within that first match it upped to 216, and started insanely lagging. I don't know what went on but I even turned off things like the private teamspeak I host from my Laptop, and since that's where alot of my connection would be directed too, did nothing to fix the fact I couldn't attack anything. I got ruined in a game where I was jungler with three of my league team-mates because there was no way I could even attack. And then the support, Thresh, who is one of the friends I play with, she was pinging 14k MS to us, then timed out of league entirely yet when I checked her ping for my TeamSpeak she was perfectly fine, nothing else locked her out, just league. I do hope that whatever it is fixes though, I already have "Killing people on league" Withdrawal xD

If you start seeing input delays again, run the WinMTR again so we can take a look at what's happening.  In regards to potential packet loss, you can also use our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted matches, which will give us an overview of that.

Hey, the grayed out button should be fixed now but let me know if it's still an issue.  Otherwise, the issues that you're reporting here sounds like common network problems failing to reach the authentication server.  Even though your internet is fine, you can still have issues reaching specific services.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and remove any blocks gaining that access.

You can also run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for any match that you've seen input delays or lag for an overview of what's happening specific to you.

Let me know if that helps.

I agree with DWlGHT here, there's more than one person with the same issue, we all connect fine when we connect but multiple times it disconnects us and tries to reconnect. But fails every time it happens. and we run fine on other games - I can play Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 perfect, no lag whatsoever unless of-course a bad host - but 3-4 bars which is my complete normal. There's something wrong with the league server itself. As what was just said by DWlGHT, if it was a network issue, only a handful of people would have the issue and it'd be fixed by now, but this is NA wide, was in a match with three friends of mine, the servers lag was that bad one of them exceeded their normal max ping then lost complete connection to league servers for over half the match, capping out at over 14k MS. Yes her internets bad but if it was her connection she would have had that MS on a private teamspeak, which I can assure you, was not the case. I do hope this gets looked into thoroughly because there's going to be a-lot more reports than this.

Edit: Considering this also - I just checked my latest network log, and I'm going to compare it with any other game I can view the ping. As the latest one states "Major issues" which I would like to see what others say their latest on today says.

I'm not disagreeing with DWIGHT that something could be going on, but it's hard to figure out what's happening without basic troubleshooting steps being done first.  I can't go over to our NOC team and tell them, "Hey something is going on.  Probably, I don't have proof and nobody's troubleshooted.  Have fun with that."

There could be so many reasons this might happen.  Some anti-virus update could have suddenly blocked people using our service mistakenly, or a specific ISP is having an issue, our servers took a shit, or it could just be a basic connection problem.  All of this is possible, so help me figure it out.  :D

So, let's help each other here and we can go from there?  What ISP are you using?  Have you gone through the connection guide?  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute from your network to our game server:  104.160.131.1.  Let it run for a few minutes, and let me know the results.  We can use this to see if there are any hiccups while reaching us.

I know this isn't problem related but "our servers took a shit" that made me laugh a little

Back to problem at hand - Just tried logging in and took over 30 seconds to authenticate. 

And the test tells me of these losses in connection -

No response from host - 100% loss

Dial.plus.net.uk - 94% loss

104.160.131.1 - 13% loss

Not sure which of those three helps but those are the losses in the test

The info we'll specifically want from MTR is the routing taken to the game server, which should be the main panel.  Copy Text to Clipboard should provide the info to see what's happening.  The packet loss won't give us specifics, but holy moly that is a lot of packet loss wherever your connection went to.

Whatever the third hop is, it dropped a ton of packets (pretty much all of it).  I can't say what it is though, because it was removed.  The IP's in these traceroutes are for the nodes that you are hopping across the world, not personal info.  The initial IP is also just for the router and mostly based on the brand, not you (gateway IP).  

Also your first hop (which is from your computer to your router) is showing a 75 ping delay, which is pretty high.  This may have be resolved with a power cycle.  xD

Let me know what that third hop is, so we can determine if it's something local or a node your ISP is having issues with.  I also cannot stress enough, guys, please go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  My poro sanity rests on this.  <3
Bruh, are you playing from EU?

Did I not say that somewhere? o.O But yeah but the issue is the same with someone in US, and I've already checked all my ISP's status' and gone through even my router, there's nothing wrong whatsoever. I've rebooted it, Reset it, even had them check out the connection and there's nothing wrong according to them. My ping for league since day one was always 115 around that. But changed to 216+ the same time everyone else has issues o.O Maybe, a-lot of providers are just getting wiped somehow from being able to connect correctly? I've taken all measures necessary to make sure I'm not a complete idiot xD

The thread's been a doozy, sorry if I missed that piece.  So here's what's happening.  The third hop on your routing is your first step through your ISP and it's totally crapped out.  Your best bet here is to call them and give them these exact logs.  Even with the distance you have reaching the NA server, you should NOT be getting this kind of packet loss.  They need to look into that node asap, especially if other folks are trying to access it.  Let me know if that helps!

Also, if you go through the connection guide try the Configure DNS section.  That can help by potentially changing how you're routing to us.

I'm going to try something, if something is seriously wrong, my EU account should have the same issue (Yes I have an EU account but most people I have known a long time play NA so..) I'll look into that now, sadly calling them would have to be tomorrow *Sad life*
Word.  I'm also concerned that you had packet loss in your local network as well.  Unless your  router is also damaged, the connection guide should help with that too.

Sorry this is happening again.  :/  Those logs look almost cut off, it's tough to tell but your ping seems to have increased well before reaching riot direct.  At this point, I highly recommend hitting us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team might be able to find some more options, or worse case get you the logs needed to reach out to your ISP if necessary. 

Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) if you haven't already to grab some logs, and attach it to your ticket to give us better context.  See you there!

This has to be an NA issue.. I'm running league perfect on EU right now, no issues, no lagging, so it isn't me. It's people's connection to the NA server, it means that somewhere NA is having issues and causing packet losses from their ISP to the League servers. I just did wonderful on EU with teemo, top of the team (since unlike some of the team i was on which were very new my guess). I'd say the fact that many many people have reported the exact same issue, it means that putting this off is no longer viable. Different stories of the game, but all revolve around the exact same issue. This needs to be looked into, there is enough reports, to state that there is something wrong.

It's happening in a game right now!!! Last game was flawless,. mobs are disappearing in jungle. !! its 7:15pm. Central time.

Its very bad!! There is only ONE server with packet loss the rest say 0%

Its the .28 one but its at 6%.. 

I keep hearing my launcher client disconnecting and connecting too.. you know the metal key ring sound it makes. 5 min later its still at 6% losing packets and lagging like mad in the game. IDK if its this server or not but i'm positive this server is a Riot server!

Hey Porocles, I just wanna thank you for your responses thus far..

Now go in the main board and look at all the new threads about packet loss LOL.
EU is perfect, no issues at all. So somewhere, somehow, the connection from me to NA is having issues. Which really does confuse me entirely.

I can safely say EU looks good, took 3 seconds to authenticate and log in, which is strange considering it takes over 30 seconds for NA o.O What the..? Just waiting on the stupid files to be updated for EU :') since I went to reinstalling league last night to see if there was just a computer error somewhere

I am also running WinMTR and wondering what information you (or a submitted report) may need. ISP is Cox, checked game logs and network logs. Game logs came back fine, network logs said I had massive packet loss (no duh). I attempted using the Hextech Repair Tool, but keep getting a "Chromium Embedded Framework Client Application has stopped working" message.

Let it run for a few minutes, and let me know the results.  We can use this to see if there are any hiccups while reaching us.

I am running WINMTR now...
Which parts of the test will you need to see? Everything that comes up on the program?

I don't use Anti-virus on this PC for the reasons of it blocking games, and if I do need to I install then uninstall when done. 

I will download this program right now, per your request and will test this for you and let you know of the results when they arrive.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dWsiAsHL,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-06-17T18:32:46.174+0000)
>
> Hey, the grayed out button should be fixed now but let me know if it's still an issue.  Otherwise, the issues that you're reporting here sounds like common network problems failing to reach the authentication server.  Even though your internet is fine, you can still have issues reaching specific services.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and remove any blocks gaining that access.
> 
> You can also run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for any match that you've seen input delays or lag for an overview of what's happening specific to you.
> 
> Let me know if that helps.

No offense intended but it's not my internet. I saw you just responded to another thread with someone saying the same thing about can't authenticate. If there was a block it would NEVER work and if it was a problem on my end, other people across the country wouldn't be reporting it as well.

No offense taken, and it's totally your choice to select not to follow those steps.  It doesn't change the context provided though, and those steps are the most basic forms of troubleshooting to pinpoint what's happening.  

League is always online, so connection issues are common and can happen at any point of service that you'll use through us.  In the chance that the guide doesn't resolve your issue, we'd be grasping at straws without that foundation being completed.  Hope you'll reconsider!

Boring ass Tank meta.

Lets design tanks that can 1 shot AP's Or Adc's
Game is for braindead people now.

Or its linked to the issue that is up on the server status? We never know. I do still think it needs to be looked into, as I haven't touched a single thing or called my provider to have it checked. Yes, Im playing on NA from central england however i've played for 4-5 years with no issues to date.

Ran the connection issues diagnostics tool, let it do it's thing, its thing didn't work so here are the zip logs it generated for you;
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B31GPgcQPPcRNGNtZy1mZ29LTUk

Okay this is odd. I am South Wales EU but playing NA server, a good few hours away from MASKJoo3 and yet his nodes match mine entirely. MASK, what provider are you on? Because two EU players can 100% prove now it's not an ISP problem due to one - Location and two - ISP difference
I'm with BT internet

There we go.

Me - Plusnet - Wales

MASK - BT - England

Yet we have the same first two node sets but a slight difference in the last node set of around 2% but two different providers and two different countries.
